subject: Re: [junit] Proposed parameterized test syntax for JUnit 4
msgSnippet: ... Extract Class! Absolutely we need it. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com 2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for
messageBody:

> Or perhaps what we need is some nice Eclipse refactorings that move test
